opensource finished product sunglasses case size width * length 10*18 cm 4*7 inch pattern restrictions please respect my effort don t share copy or post this pattern without my written permission finished product restrictions feel free to use the finished product as you like you can sell it exchange or donate it however i would very appreciate if you keep the link that it was made by pattern from @madebyasya preparations 1 yarn of group 2 sport 125 m 137 yds / 50 g 1 8 oz 50 g 1 7 oz for example drops loves you 9 schachenmayr catania originals gazzal giza katia capri patons north america grace schoeller + stahl limone inbalit heela paintbox yarns cotton dk lana gatto milo rowan summerlite dk 2 crochet hook 3 0 mm 3 scissors 4 markers 5 measuring tape gauge 22 single_crochet x 26-27 row = 10 cm/ 4 inch in width and 10 cm/ 4 inch vertically for 3 0 mm hook size or size needed to get 2 all rights reserved pattern photos sunglasses case - opensource sunglasses case first part of the case with 3 0 mm hook 21 chains row 1 20 single_crochet 1st single_crochet in 2nd chain counted from the hook turn row 2 chain 1 20 single_crochet turn row 3-41 repeat row 2 round 42 edge chain 1 19 single_crochet make 3 single_crochet in next stitch 1st corner then make a 90- degree turn to work on the edge work with single_crochet around other 3 sides of the piece 1 single_crochet in each stitch/ in each side of row and make 3 single_crochet in next 2 corners in last stitch of the round make 2 single_crochet 4th corner and finish with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet at the beginning of the round cut and fasten the yarn second part of the case make the other part the same way repeat row 1-41 and round 42 don t cut the yarn assembly joining first and second parts round 1a with wrong side facing each other chain 1 start near the corner work with slip_stitch around 3 sides of the case through both thickness under back loop of round 42
